user_data.target_needs: I wanted to find a bra that provided both comfort and support, particularly for my specific body type and needs.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a bra that offered good support and comfort, especially given my specific body type. The full-frame construction and the promise of a no-bulge look were appealing. However, the fit was not ideal for me, as I found the band to be too tight and lacking in stretch, which ultimately made it uncomfortable. I relied on the product's features and my previous experiences with similar items to make my decision.

I needed a comfortable bra to wear at home that wouldn't irritate my back, but I also required adequate support due to my size. The description highlighted comfort and flexibility, which were important to me. However, I found that it did not provide the necessary support, leading me to realize that I should have prioritized underwire options. My decision was based on product details and my specific needs.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, quality, and good value for money. I appreciate items that are made from natural materials, such as cotton, and those that provide a soft and warm feel. I also value well-made accessories that are aesthetically pleasing and come in attractive packaging, making them suitable for gifting. Additionally, I tend to favor products that fit well and are true to size, as well as those that are durable and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I dislike products that are misrepresented in terms of material, such as synthetic items being labeled as leather, and I have a strong aversion to items that do not fit properly or lack adequate support, especially in footwear and undergarments. Overall, I seek a balance of comfort, quality, and accurate product descriptions in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find a bra that offers both comfort and support, tailored to my specific body type and needs. within my expected price range: [18.99, 20.78]
What specific features or design elements are important to you when looking for a bra that offers both comfort and support?

I look for bras that offer comfort and support by prioritizing features like wide straps, underwire for extra support, and soft, breathable fabric. A design that ensures a smooth silhouette under clothing is also essential to me.
What is your preferred bra closure type?
I prefer bras with hook-and-eye closures, as they provide a secure fit and are adjustable for comfort.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Maidenform Women's Comfort Devotion Bra, Full Coverage Underwire Bra, Cushionwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0BQYY4ZCG / Price: $17.47 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Crafted from luxe suede-like fabric, this full coverage bra from Maidenform® feels incredibly soft and comfortable against your skin. Designed with cushioned underwire cups for extra shape and lift without the pinch and dig, this women’s bra is ideal for everyday wear. Convertible straps can be worn straight or crisscross, giving you even more versatile options. Finished with back and side smoothing for a sleek look beneath your clothes, this Maidenform women’s bra offers back hook-and-eye closure for easy styling.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Exquisite Form 5100531 Fully Wireless Cotton Back & Posture Support Bra> / Item ID: B000E0V532 / Price: $18.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Since 1945, we at Exquisite Form have made it our signature mission to design lingerie for you, the real woman who comes in all shapes and sizes. We\'ve understood for a long time that full-figured women "need a fuller bra, not a bigger bra." That\'s why we\'ve designed our FULLY bras to have targeted innovative features, like powernet support frames, extra support undercups, and stretch sides. Available in extended sizes, our FULLY collection features wireless and underwire bras, longlines, posture bras, minimizer bras, bras with lined cups, padded straps and everything in between. Whether you need a fuller fit or more support, you\'ll find a FULLY bra to fit your needs. In every stitch, there is a promise of fit, durability, and quality. A promise we\'ve kept for over 70 years.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Just My Size Women's Easy On Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1107> / Item ID: B08V8YTH95 / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Love the convenience of front-close bras? Here's one that combines front-hook ease with comfortable full support. All at an affordable price in sizes up to 54 DD!"]
I need ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge'] category products.
What specific size range are you looking for in bras to ensure the best fit and comfort for your specific body type and needs?
I typically look for bras in sizes that range from 38C to 40D to ensure the best fit and comfort for my specific body type and needs.
What fabric materials do you prefer in bras to ensure both comfort and support for your specific body type and needs?

I prefer bras made from soft and breathable fabrics like cotton or modal to ensure both comfort and support for my specific body type and needs. Natural materials are important to me as they provide a gentle feel against the skin and allow for breathability, which is essential for all-day comfort.
